description: Definition of the AWS::QuickSight::Theme Resource Type.

BorderStyle.description: The display options for tile borders for visuals.

Show.description: The option to enable display of borders for visuals.
Show.markdownDescription:
The option to enable display of borders for visuals.

--- Required: No Type: Boolean Update requires: No interruption

BorderStyle.markdownDescription:
The display options for tile borders for visuals.

--- Required: No Update requires: No interruption

DataColorPalette.description: The theme colors that are used for data colors in charts. The colors description is a hexadecimal color code that consists of six alphanumerical characters, prefixed with #, for example #37BFF5.

Type: String

GutterStyle.description: The display options for gutter spacing between tiles on a sheet.

Show.description: This Boolean value controls whether to display a gutter space between sheet tiles.

--- Required: No Type: Boolean Update requires: No interruption

--- Required: No Update requires: No interruption

MarginStyle.description: The display options for margins around the outside edge of sheets.

Show.description: This Boolean value controls whether to display sheet margins.
Show.markdownDescription:
This Boolean value controls whether to display sheet margins.

--- Required: No Type: Boolean Update requires: No interruption

MarginStyle.markdownDescription:

--- Required: No Update requires: No interruption

Principal.description:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the principal. This can be one of the following:

  • The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user or group associated with a data source or dataset. (This is common.)

  • The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user, group, or namespace associated with an analysis, dashboard, template, or theme. (This is common.)

  • The ARN of an Amazon Web Services account root: This is an IAM ARN rather than a QuickSight ARN. Use this option only to share resources (templates) across Amazon Web Services accounts. (This is less common.)
Principal.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the principal. This can be one of the following:

  • The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user or group associated with a data source or dataset. (This is common.)

  • The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user, group, or namespace associated with an analysis, dashboard, template, or theme. (This is common.)

  • The ARN of an Amazon Web Services account root: This is an IAM ARN rather than a QuickSight ARN. Use this option only to share resources (templates) across Amazon Web Services accounts. (This is less common.)

--- Required: Yes Type: String Minimum Length: 1 Maximum Length: 256 Update requires: No interruption

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

BaseThemeId.description: The Amazon QuickSight-defined ID of the theme that a custom theme inherits from. All themes initially inherit from a default Amazon QuickSight theme.

The Amazon QuickSight-defined ID of the theme that a custom theme inherits from. All themes initially inherit from a default Amazon QuickSight theme.

--- Required: No Type: String Minimum Length: 1 Maximum Length: 512 Pattern: ^[\w\-]+$ Update requires: No interruption

UIColorPalette.description: The theme colors that apply to UI and to charts, excluding data colors. The colors description is a hexadecimal color code that consists of six alphanumerical characters, prefixed with #, for example #37BFF5. For more information, see Using Themes in Amazon QuickSight in the Amazon QuickSight User Guide.

PrimaryForeground.description: The color of text and other foreground elements that appear over the primary background regions, such as grid lines, borders, table banding, icons, and so on.
PrimaryForeground.markdownDescription:
The color of text and other foreground elements that appear over the primary background regions, such as grid lines, borders, table banding, icons, and so on.

--- Required: No Type: String Pattern: ^#[A-F0-9]{6}$ Update requires: No interruption

PrimaryBackground.description: The background color that applies to visuals and other high emphasis UI.
PrimaryBackground.markdownDescription:
The background color that applies to visuals and other high emphasis UI.

--- Required: No Type: String Pattern: ^#[A-F0-9]{6}$ Update requires: No interruption

SecondaryForeground.description: The foreground color that applies to any sheet title, sheet control text, or UI that appears over the secondary background.
SecondaryForeground.markdownDescription:
The foreground color that applies to any sheet title, sheet control text, or UI that appears over the secondary background.

--- Required: No Type: String Pattern: ^#[A-F0-9]{6}$ Update requires: No interruption

SecondaryBackground.description: The background color that applies to the sheet background and sheet controls.
SecondaryBackground.markdownDescription:
The background color that applies to the sheet background and sheet controls.

--- Required: No Type: String Pattern: ^#[A-F0-9]{6}$ Update requires: No interruption

This color is that applies to selected states and buttons.

--- Required: No Type: String Pattern: ^#[A-F0-9]{6}$ Update requires: No interruption

The foreground color that applies to any text or other elements that appear over the accent color.
